Package org.apache.james.nntpserver

Interface Summary
AuthService Authenticates users and Access Control for User Commands.
 

Class Summary
ArticleWriter.Factory  
AuthServiceImpl Provides Authentication State.
DateSinceFileFilter filters files according to their date of last modification
LISTGroup.Factory  
NNTPHandler The NNTP protocol is defined by RFC 977.
NNTPServer NNTP Server Protocol Handler
 

Exception Summary
NNTPException Exception Wrapper, like javax.servlet.ServletException.
